longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Visitors can obtain a visa on arrival at Minsk (MSQ) if
   
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Romania will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- All visitors are required to have health insurance which can
  be purchased on arrival in Minsk (MSQ)
